title: Is high school marching band popular in all 50 states? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not entirely popular, but it is present. Texas, Florida, California, and Georgia have the most prestigious high school marching bands, which makes marching band a little more popular in those states but otherwise, marching band is not as popular in other states, partially due to colder weather during marching season (i.e. New York) and lack of good bands to represent that state.
